item.title: Migrating your company website to WordPress Self Hosted
item.description: WordPress is one of the most popular solutions for blogging. What people don't know is that WordPress self hosted is the best solution for building a standalone B2B or SME company website.

item.title: Best WordPress plugins for social media marketing
item.description: Social Media Marketing plugins for WordPress - you only need a few to have a powerful integrated marketing website.
